line.text: 's are no longer claiming the sector '
'As my empire grows, the Sith become more of a threat. Eventually i must destroy all their stations.'
' planets. I need to point out the planets I want to terraform through the Ministry Of War.'

line.comment: * Safety: remove coalitions when needed. Even though coalitions are updated at each conquer, sometimes a coalition cannot be properly removed.
* To make the game more dynamic, we check if possible coalitions are possible every 12 hours.
* Must not be Huge ships, see Mayhem.Task.XenonInvader.Leader. (3.11: we don't care, let's be chaotic)

sval.val: s are no longer claiming the sector
As my empire grows, the Sith become more of a threat. Eventually i must destroy all their stations.
The Cartell wants me to terraform
planets. I need to point out the planets I want to terraform through the Ministry Of War.
Safety: remove coalitions when needed. Even though coalitions are updated at each conquer, sometimes a coalition cannot be properly removed.
To make the game more dynamic, we check if possible coalitions are possible every 12 hours.
Must not be Huge ships, see Mayhem.Task.XenonInvader.Leader. (3.11: we don't care, let's be chaotic)
